name: Natto Fried Rice
author: Kurumi
summary: Natto is very popular in Japan, but not all Japanese like it. This food has people divided between those who like it and those who hate it because it has a special flavor and taste. Do you like natto? I like it very much because it's good for health.
ingredients: ½  cabbage, sliced into thin strips
salt and ground black pepper to taste
⅛ cup crumbled laver, or to taste
1 pinch dried bonito flakes, or more to taste
directions: Combine natto and eggs in a bowl; mix well
Add cooked rice and mix using a rice paddle
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Spread egg mixture in the skillet and cook without stirring until browned, about 2 minutes
Stir until mixed in and heated through, about 5 minutes
Season fried rice with salt and pepper
Place portions onto 3 individual plates; sprinkle laver and bonito flakes on top
